DOC.brief_summary: This study design predict weight gain overtime high fat diet .
DOC.brief_title: `` ADAPT '' The Adaptation High Fat Diets Extention
DOC.detailed_description: In past 3 year identify `` thrifty-phenotype '' characterize lean men inability adapt rapidly high fat diet associate low maximal VO2 high fasting insulin . We hypothesize individual `` thrifty phenotype '' high risk become obese , exercise may effective overcoming problem . Several question remain answered regard `` thrifty '' phenotype . First , give large interindividual difference , identify high risk ? What distinguish biochemical , endocrine environmental characteristic individual store fat expose high fat diet ? This important individual easily identify , dietary intervention target `` at-risk '' population . Second , different individual `` thrifty phenotype '' ? Are cellular pathway dysregulated skeletal muscle individual compare control ? Is defect intrinsic , i.e . diminish ability conserve glucose oxidize fat skeletal muscle alternately , phenotype due environmental , dietary factor inactivity energy excess ? To answer question , plan three-year project aim : - Characterize biochemical , endocrine , anthropometric environmental characteristic individual `` thrifty '' phenotype . - Identify signal pathway skeletal muscle dysregulated individual `` thrifty '' phenotype mRNA expression profile skeletal tissue . - Determine role environmental factor inactivity caloric intake vs. intrinsic ( genetic ) factor `` thrifty '' phenotype .
DOC.criteria: Both gender race invite participate Women ask participate follicular phase menstrual cycle determine menstrual history negative pregnancy test record prior participation BMI > 19 < 35 Age 1830 Exclusion Criteria Smokers Unwilling unable abstain alcohol consumption caffeine consumption prior test laboratory Significant renal , hepatic , endocrine , pulmonary , cardiac hematological disease Pregnancy Corticosteroid use previous two month Chronic use antidiabetic , antihypertensive , medication know affect fat metabolism Use DepoProvera , hormone implant estrogen replacement therapy Irregular menstrual cycle Postmenopausal woman Weight gain loss > 3kg last 6 month For MRI , follow exclusion criterion apply : Individuals heart pacemaker , defibrillator , nonremovable hearing aid Individuals clip metal plate head Individuals artificial limb prosthetic device Individuals ever injure metallic foreign body remove Individuals , wear brace teeth , nonremovable false teeth , removable bridgework
